name: Batch Operations
description: Process multiple items with a single tool call, respecting rate limits and aggregating results

criteria.criterion: execute_batch tool is exposed and accepts tool_name, items array, and options
Batch executes tool for each item with configurable concurrency (default: 5 parallel)
Rate limiting respects GHL API limits (100 req/min) with automatic throttling
Failed items are collected separately with error details, successful items continue processing
Result aggregation supports 'summary' mode (counts only) and 'detail' mode (all results with optional projection)
Batch of 50 items executes without timing out (respects rate limits, uses streaming if needed)
